trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Gary
There were no other sightings in Gary on or around September 30th 1972
Summary: saw a saucer like 2 plates put together.
divs: Sighting DetailsWitness called dispatch, statement was typed up by Mufon Dispatch...Steve Cox. Flatted disc like putting 2 plates together with a dome on top and bottom, approx. 50 foot long length of 2 foot ball field,less than 1000 feet from witness, between 11th and 15th ave closer to 11th, chased it with his charger, was looking for windows in the saucer, was going slow, like drifting heading due west. bottom dome was turning, around the outter body of the rim looked like light holes. was watching object through his sun roof. could not see lights just light holes, color of object was medium gray. Didnt have a camera at the time of the sighting. Continue to IL. State line. Object looked to be man made to his oppinion. It was a sunny warm day with a few clouds in the sky.
